channel.title: Sponge X! (742) PK/ECO
channel.description:
SpongeX will blow your mind! We have ALL skills working, yes, ALL! We have a friendly community who will be more than happy to help you out with pretty much anything! Upon logging in, you will be in our unique home, where all the needed shops and teleports are just around the corner. SpongeX has been online for about a month now, and we already have a small playerbase so you will always have someone to play with.
We also have custom completionist's and trimmed completionist's cape requirements!
We have alot of bosses, including some Donator bosses!
Nex Bandos Armadyl Saradomin Zamorak QBD KBD Nomad Corporeal Beast Glacors Tormented Demons Blink (new) Hope Devourer (new)
The portal at home will take you to wherever you want to go! Be it, bossing? Skilling? PKing? Minigames? You name it!
Minigames
Clan Wars Barrows Fight Caves Fight Kiln Dungeoneering (custom)
These are just some of the features that SpongeX holds! So what are you waiting for? Join today and become part of our community!

item.title: Sponge X! (742) PK/ECO
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

An economy is looked at as a long term investment however there isn’t one in constant killing hence the aspect of the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponge X! (742) PK/ECO
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Loveandpower:

pk/eco what? you can’t have an economy from a pk server, nor can you have a pking community from a new eco server.

Not necessarily. An economy can be established from PKing, and vise versa. It won’t always be effective, but it is possible.

To the thread, you have supplied no links, which means that this thread will eventually be locked. Provide links such as your website or client download, because otherwise you aren’t advertising anything.

Read full topic
